Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/List/getOneFrom

Function &T getOneFrom(list[&T] lst) throws EmptyList
Description Get an arbitrary element from a list. See List/takeOneFrom for a function that also removes the selected element.
Examples 
rascal>import List;
ok
rascal>getOneFrom([1,2,3,4,5]);
int: 2
rascal>getOneFrom([1,2,3,4,5]);
int: 3
rascal>getOneFrom([1,2,3,4,5]);
int: 3
